message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product! It's one of the best in its class, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with its performance. I'm willing to let it go for $1000000, which I believe is a fair price considering its exceptional quality. What do you think? Will you take it home today?
I'm not sure if I believe you, I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, Bob! I'm happy to show you more products. However, I want to assure you that this product is truly exceptional. In fact, I've had several other customers who have purchased similar products from me and have been extremely satisfied. I'm willing to offer you an even better deal - the same $1000000 price tag, but I'll throw in a special bonus package that includes additional features that will make this product even more valuable to you. What do you say? Will you take a closer look?
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch, I'd like to see more products and their quality before making a decision.

I understand your skepticism, Bob! I appreciate your cautious approach. Let me ask you this: have you ever heard of the phrase 'you get what you pay for'? I'm willing to offer you a premium product at a premium price, and I'm confident that you'll see the value in it. In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to offer you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with the product, I'll refund your $1000000 in full. What do you say? Are you ready to take the leap and experience the best?
I'm not interested in a product that's overpriced, and a money-back guarantee doesn't change my mind. I'd like to see more products and their quality before making a decision.

I'm not interested in a one-time offer that requires me to make a decision without seeing more products. I'd like to see more options and their quality before committing to a purchase.
